answerText: Fuenteovejuna [or The Sheep Well][10] Lope de Vega was an author from this country's Golden Age. This country also produced Don Quixote.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 13 | 4 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play tells of a commander of the Order of Calatrava who tries to rape Laurencia but gets driven away by Frondoso, with the help of that commander's own crossbow. [10] Name this play by Lope de Vega in which the people of the title town end up killing that commander, Fernan Gomez de Guzman, after Guzman repeatedly harasses those people.
